name: Space Coaster VR
description:
Jump into hyper speed and hold tight as you experience this galactic ride.
Mars, Venus, Earth, the Stars and much more as you dive deeper into space.
Remember the galaxy is vast and your journey starts here.

a space environment with a planetary experience.

see the sun as it radiates in space, watch that you don't get burned though.

its a bright colorful ride with plenty of fluorescent colors.

be sure to stay on track and don't crash.
